meanings.definition: The state or quality of being excessively viscous.
meanings.sent1: The hyperviscosity of the syrup made it difficult to pour.
meanings.sent2: The hyperviscosity of the mud caused the wheels to get stuck.
meanings.sent3: The hyperviscosity of the slime made it a challenge to clean up.
meanings.sent4: The hyperviscosity of the glue held the pieces together tightly.
meanings.sent5: The hyperviscosity of the honey made it slowly drip from the spoon.

meanings.definition: Excessive thickness or stickiness of a fluid.
meanings.sent1: The hyperviscosity of the oil affected the engine's performance.
meanings.sent2: The hyperviscosity of the paint made it hard to spread evenly.
meanings.sent3: The hyperviscosity of the slime made it a fun challenge to play with.
meanings.sent4: The hyperviscosity of the syrup resembled molasses in its flow.
meanings.sent5: The hyperviscosity of the glue created a strong bond between the pieces.
